alert.note: Alert for Osage (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 4:44AM CDT until May 17 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OSAGE COUNTY... At 443 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northwest of Hominy, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Pawhuska... Skiatook... Hominy... Barnsdall... Shidler... Wynona... Avant... Pearsonia... Bartlesville Municipal Airport... Sunset Lake... Osage Hills State Park... Okesa... Webb City... Tallant... Pershing... Nelagoney... Wolco... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
